channel.title: Blog on SURPASS2-PT
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on SURPASS2-PT

item.title: A Century of Bee Data
item.description: Mobilizing Biodiversity Data Over the last year, our partners in Chile have worked to mobilize, standardize, and digitize a century of bee data in Chile. With this effort, our colleagues have secured 100 years of biological recording for generations and made it available to the world via the GBIF portal. This database presents the largest dataset of Chilean wild bees (Apoidea) with 36,010 records comprising over 40 years of data.

item.title: PoMS no exterior
item.description: Contando polinizadores No âmbito do projeto SURPASS2 (Safeguarding pollination services in a changing world: theory into practice), financiado pelo NERC, que reúne pesquisadores do Reino Unido, Argentina, Brasil e Chile, implementamos pela primeira vez a metodologia de contagem FIT no Chile. Através de uma colaboração com o projeto regional EXPLORA da Região de La Araucanía, no sul do Chile, adaptamos o esquema de monitoramento de polinizadores desenvolvido no Reino Unido para a América do Sul.
